xbrli:xbrl.in-bse-fin:DisclosureOfNotesOnFinancialR: A. Cash Flow from Operating Activities n n1. ‘Other adjustments for non-cash items’ includes ‘Loss on sale of property, plant and equipment – Net’ of Rs. 36.68 Crores, ‘Doubtful and bad debts’ of Rs. 14.61 Crores and ‘Doubtful and bad advances, loans and deposits’ of Rs. 32.58 Crores. n nB. Cash Flow from Investing Activities n n1. ‘Cash flows used in obtaining control of subsidiaries or other businesses’ include ‘Investment in subsidiaries’ of Rs. 2341.83 Crores and ‘Investment in associate’ of Rs. 1.87 Crores. n n2. ‘Other cash receipts from sales of equity or debt instruments of other entities’ includes ‘Sale / redemption of current investments’ of Rs. 32868.84 Crores and ‘Redemption proceeds of non-current investments’ of Rs. 1480.10 Crores. n n3. ‘Other cash payments to acquire equity or debt instruments of other entities’ includes ‘Purchase of current investments’ of Rs. 28697.74 Crores and ‘Purchase of non-current investments’ of Rs. 0.45 Crores. n n4. ‘Other inflows (outflows) of cash’ includes ‘Investment in bank deposits (original maturity more than 3 months)’ of Rs. 2650.53 Crores, ‘Redemption / maturity of bank deposits (original maturity more than 3 months)’ of Rs. 6258.37 Crores, ‘Investment in deposit with housing finance companies’ of Rs. 39.22 Crores and ‘Redemption / maturity of deposit with housing finance companies’ of Rs. 300 Crores. n nC. Cash Flow from Financing Activities n n1. ‘Dividends paid’ includes ‘Dividend paid’ of Rs. 11521.01 Crores and ‘Dividend distribution tax (paid) / refund received’ of Rs. 13.99 Crores. n n2. ‘Other inflows (outflows) of cash’ represents ‘Net increase in statutory restricted accounts balances’.
